meanings.definition: The ability of a substance to dissolve in a liquid.
meanings.sent1: The solubility of sugar in water makes it easy to sweeten drinks.
meanings.sent2: The solubility of salt in water is a common science experiment.
meanings.sent3: The solubility of the candy in my mouth was so high, it disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had a solubility that melted even the coldest hearts.
meanings.sent5: The solubility of the ink in the water created a beautiful swirling pattern.

meanings.definition: The state or property of being soluble.
meanings.sent1: The solubility of the medication in water made it easy to swallow.
meanings.sent2: The solubility of the dye in the fabric determined its colorfastness.
meanings.sent3: The solubility of the puzzle pieces in my hands made it hard to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: His solubility in the team's dynamics made him a valuable member.
meanings.sent5: The solubility of the oil in the mixture created a smooth texture.
